alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Collier County through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Naples Park, or 8 miles northwest of Naples, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Lely and Quail Creek Estate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
